level.text: The amount of the living wage shall be eleven dollars and seventy-five cents ($11.75) per hour, regardless of whether health benefits are provided.
The amount of the living wage shall be adjusted pursuant to section 103(c) of the Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 2-220.03(c)).
Source: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 58 DCR 2831, 2832 (April 1, 2011).
